summary:
LazyTown is a popular kids' TV show from Iceland. Created by fitness expert Magn√∫s Scheving, it teaches young viewers about healthy living. The series started as a book and stage play before becoming a TV program in 2003. It's been translated into many languages and shown worldwide.

The show is unique as it mixes live actors, puppets, and computer animation. It follows the adventures of Sportacus, a superhero who promotes fitness, and his friends in the town of LazyTown. New episodes were made in 2013, and there are also spin-offs like *LazyTown Extra* for younger kids.
title: LazyTown
